title: Official release - Newcastle United and Benfica media schedules made public
body_text:
Official release – Newcastle United and Benfica media schedules made public
The media schedules for both Newcastle United an Benfica have now been made public.
An official club release (see below) from the Portuguese club revealing the details.
Benfica will allow the media in for the first 15 minutes of Monday’s training in Portugal, then Jose Mourinho and his squad will fly to Newcastle on a charter flight at 3.35pm tomorrow.
Mourinho and one of his players will then be on media duties, speaking to journalists, at 7.30pm on Monday night.
As for Newcastle United, they will allow media access at the same time (11am) on Monday at training for 15 minutes.
With then Eddie Howe and one of the NUFC players on media duties at 4pm tomorrow afternoon.
Benfica official club release – 19 October 2025:
The press program for the professional football teams of SL Benfica and Newcastle for Matchday 3 of the Champions League (league phase) in England is now set.
The match, to be played at St. James’ Park, is scheduled to kick off at 8 pm on Tuesday, October 21.
Monday, October 20
PROGRAM OF SL BENFICA
11 am | Training open to the press for the first 15 minutes at Benfica Campus
3:35 pm | Charter flight from Lisbon to Newcastle
St. James’ Park (Newcastle)
19h30 | Press conference with the coach and a player
PROGRAM OF NEWCASTLE
11 am | Training open to the press for the first 15 minutes at Newcastle Training Centre
4 pm | Press conference with the coach and a player at St. James’ Park
